A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I think i went in to this movie a little better prepared than the casual fan. I have read every new canon novel and all comic book arcs...especially important are \"Leia: Princess of Alderaan\" and \"Bloodline\" as well as the Poe Daemeron comic series. I really enjoyed the humour that some are complaining about and the big moments are ground-shaking and change the Star Wars mythos forever. I respect Rian Johnson's willingness to take risks with the property and this fact alone puts \"The Last Jedi\" above \"The Force Awakens\" for me. I need to see it again ASAP but really\, REALLY enjoyed the first viewing.
